description: All units consist of a seating area with a sofa, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, a microwave, a fridge and an oven. A stovetop is also featured, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine.
All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a bathtub or shower.

A room with a queen-sized bed. May be occupied by one or more people. Each room of this type is soundproofed and air conditioned, and equipped with a minibar and satellite TV. All the guest rooms are accessible via an elevator. serves a continental breakfast every morning, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of the guest rooms. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar, or in the lounge with library
king room offers a concierge service and a 24-hour reception desk.This is our guests' favorite part of hotel, according to independent reviews

A room that can accommodate two persons with two twin beds joined together by a common headboard. Most of the budget hotels tend to provide many of these room settings which cater both couples and parties in two
A room with two twin beds. May be occupied by one or more people.The room size or area of Twin Rooms are generally between 32 m² to 40 m²

A Room with two double ( or perhaps queen) beds. And can accommodate two to four persons with two twin, double or queen-size beds.The room size or area of Double-double / Double Twin rooms are generally between 50 m² to 70 m²
A parlour or living room connected with to one or more bedrooms. (A room with one or more bedrooms and a separate living space.)
A single room with a bed and sitting area. Sometimes the sleeping area is in a bedroom separate from the parlour or living room.
